Do not expect the full 200 shot capability if you use the screen continuously or use it to show pictures to the others. Srongly suggest you consider a backup battery and charger.

Reviews.Title: Great, small, and super-easy point and shoot
Reviews.Author: ryan delahanty
Reviews.Content: It can't get much easier than this. The pictures are great. The zoom is impressive. The rechargeable battery will save you about $10 billion in camera battery costs. In Florida, our friends who have a very nice Canon were constantly swapping out batteries. We just charged up each night. Our camera holds as much after getting a 16G card--which is all you should need--and it takes pictures just as nice as theirs while fitting in your pocket. It's a winner.Only reasons for four instead of five stars is that the default setting for video is  not MP4 format, but some other kind of format like AV-something. Not a fan of this. Also, it doesn't seem to transfer photos directly to Picasa. This might be fixed by getting rid of that strange video format and changing it to MP4. If that works out, I may upgrade to 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this camera!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Tiedt "bonton"
Reviews.Content: I love love love this camera. I have a Nikon dSLR but always like a pocket sized camera for in my purse. I needed something to replace the crappy Canon SD1400is which lasted only a year.I choose this camera because of the size, simple settings, and the HD video. Pictures seem to be very true to color.  Below is a link to a video I took the night after the camera arrived.  Keep in mind that I was a couple of rows back and it was a dark casino. I am very pleased with the quality.[...]

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: Only used it once but so far it is much better than my previous camera. It is easy to use, feather light and took great pictures. Not sure about the different settings yet.

Reviews.Title: Good work camera
Reviews.Author: the_wanderer "Peter"
Reviews.Content: I use this camera mostly at work where a picture is worth more than a thousand words, usually for very close up photos of something broken or not right.  It focuses very quick for very clear photos, better than other cameras I have used.  Then I usually just turn it off and leave it attached to the USB port an it keeps it charged.

Reviews.Title: Wanted to love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Form factor, ease of use and price are all great attributes of this camera.Image quality does not quite come up to my expectations especially for travel/landscape photos.This camera is very easy to use and if your need is for a handy, reliable camera and you need only small images (web, 4x5 prints) you might be delighted with this one.If you're a pixel peeper - keep looking as you won't be satisfied upon examination of image details.I also own the DMC-LX7 "big brother" to this camera which is more costly & bulkier but of superb image quality.

Reviews.Title: That is really good!
Reviews.Author: ngoclanngo
Reviews.Content: nice shoot, and fast.That is really good, and so cheap.You can go to trip with Panasonic Lumix SZ7 anywhere...If you like Paramount's technical so this is your best choice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Mike S.
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything I need.  Takes great pictures & videos and has more features than I'd ever require.  One of the main selling points for me was getting so much optical zoom in a cheap camera that fits in your pocket.I got it about 9 months ago when it was only $133, but it's still a great camera in the price range.Anything without AA batteries is a deal breaker for some people, but I don't mind plugging it in to charge it and a charge lasts a really long time anyway.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!  I'm not much of a picture taker
Reviews.Author: BestDayofMyLife "Great Shopper"
Reviews.Content: but I got this one to document our nasty living situation in the anticipation of submitting to the court.LOL, very elderly FIL's house with very nasty, spoiled, violent, tantrum-throwing adult SIL and we can do nothing about it for now except document everything.Did this make enough words to submit?

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Roberts
Reviews.Content: This small camera is amazing. I've taken it on my international trips, and  it's perfect. Great buy for the price!

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: YAYA
Reviews.Content: I wanted a nice little camera to take to Italy....read all of the wonderful reviews about this camera and bought it.  The pictures are great, the panoramic feature is wonderful and it zooms and holds a charge forever.  it was easy enough to keep in any purse or even a pocket.  We have a large fancy camera but who wants to drag that on a vacation.

Reviews.Title: I did not like this camera
Reviews.Author: Borocay
Reviews.Content: I tried to like this camera, but the LCD screen is horrible.  The pictures that it took were okay, but trying to see them on the LCD screen with the poor viewing angle was an exercise in futility.  I returned it for that reason.

Reviews.Title: Lumix
Reviews.Author: gina "amonr"
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, had an older version but the sensor broke at 13000 feet so I got the newer one :-)

Reviews.Title: love this camera so much, I bought it again!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: 2nd day of vacation in Greece, on one of those cute little tourist trains, I gave my Lumix SZ7 to my boyfriend to hold for a minute... Well, he dropped it and the wheel of the train ran over it!  (you can't make this stuff up.)  (Fortunately had drops-and-spills insurance on it.)  I used his camera for the rest of the trip.  When I got home, I started camera shopping and discovered lots of new features since I'd bought the old one over a year earlier.  But after buying and returning 3 cameras with the latest & greatest - wifi, stronger zoom, etc. - I realized I just wanted my old SZ7 back.  So I was thrilled to find the SZ7 for sale on Amazon, and am very happy that I bought it.  It takes great photos, & I especially like that there's very little delay between shots.  The only issue I have with the photos is I wish it took better photos in low light.  But besides that, I'm not missing any of the "new" features.  It's little and light, it's solidly built, and imho it has the best interface of any I tried - buttons, menus, etc.  I'm happy to have it back again.

Reviews.Title: Great snappy little camera.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Flinchum Jr.
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife and she really likes it. I especially like the speed of this thing. We have three young kids and are constantly snapping photos, so it was important for us to have a camera that could take the picture fast enough before the kids moved or looked away. The HD video is also very nice, especially with the two separate microphones for stereo sound.  This is a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Good point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Philip Sydell "The Artist"
Reviews.Content: It takes great photos and is so easy to carry even in your shirt pocket.  Not sure if it is better than the iPhone camera but certainly more versatile.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for point and shoot use
Reviews.Author: Steph Moore
Reviews.Content: This camera? Takes awesome photos! It's a point and shoot for me (I have a larger digital SLR that I can use for artistic type stuff) and it's small enough that I can stick it in almost any pocket and go. It's been particularly useful in helping me document installation procedures or steps in a process. I installed a fuse box on my motorcycle and wanted to build a sort of "how-to" for other folks to use. I just stuck the camera in my pants leg pocket, pulled it out to take photos when I completed a step, and stuck it back in my pocket. Very useful and it took fantastic, crisp, close-up photos very well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent all around camera.  Great pictures, fast focs and quick picture capture.
Reviews.Author: Dave W.
Reviews.Content: Fast efficient picture taking.  Fairly intuitive for most of the normal modes.  Autofocus works quickly.  Also very quick to take picture once shutter button is pressed.  Very little waiting, flash or not, to capture picture which is so much nicer than the 3 other similar type cameras I've used over the past 10 years.

Reviews.Title: Was great... when it worked!
Reviews.Author: Rogue
Reviews.Content: I've had this for less than a year, happily taking pics and vid clips.  This camera replaced a very old (ca. 2003) Kodak digital camera that I was using all the time until its aperture no longer opened when powered on.  Anyways, the Panasonic was fine one day when I took a pic of something, but the next day when I went to take a pic it wouldn't focus.  When it is powered on, it brings up a white screen saying to turn the camera off and back on again.  After doing that, another white screen saying "System Error (Focus)."  No kidding!  The lens won't retract, so I have to trick it into retracting by switching to preview mode.And here I am, less than a week before a weekend event when I REALLY wanted my camera, and it's broken!  Here's hoping that I can send in this camera to be fixed since it's still under warranty (lucky me).  I'm currently looking at Canon products.  There goes a major chunk of my spending money for the weekend!  Thanks Panasonic! >:(I see in another review that this camera has plastic bits inside, whereas a Canon has metal equivalents.  I wish companies would make products that will last more than a few years.  I hate having to buy a new, replacement product and getting used to its controls and quirks.Edit/update: I got my Canon point & shoot replacement today (thanks Amazon Prime! --> Canon PowerShot ELPH 520 HS 10.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 12x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom 28mm Wide-Angle Lens and 1080p Full HD Video Recording (Black)).  I've barely used it but already like it... "Made in Japan."  The DMC-SZ7 is "Made in China" :-\

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7 14.1 - Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Debbie from Maryland
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace a Kodak camera. I have not used it much but the specs. appears to be very appealing.

Reviews.Title: This is a good camera.
Reviews.Author: Pennstater2005
Reviews.Content: Keep your expectations reasonable and you will like this camera.  I own a Nikon D40 and knew this would not replace a DSLR.  What it did was take fantastic pictures in outdoor daylight and indoors with good light available.  In low light situations it produces ok results.  But I knew and expected that going in.  I bought this refurbished for $79 and it was a steal.  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: Roquie "Roquie"
Reviews.Content: Camera works very well.  Small, convenient size.  Takes good pictures.  Uses proprietary USB cable, so spare cables are very expensive, and it's one more USB cable style to travel with.  Since there are so many similar cameras available, would recommend getting one with a more generic USB port.

Reviews.Title: Did not hold up
Reviews.Author: M. Lutton
Reviews.Content: I waited a half a year to write a review as I assume any and every camera is durable enough out of the box. Picture quality is good; camera was fine for first few months. However, it did not survive a trip to Italy. Being opened 20-30 times a day while sightseeing, the lense began to have troubles retracting when turned off. Then, it failed to open all together during the middle of the trip and was out of commission. I don't think this is a high volume, high use camera based on my experience.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use for an novice!
Reviews.Author: Clayster
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect camera for a total novice like me.  I had a way outdated 4mp 3x optical zoom sony that I wanted to upgrade and this fit the bill.  Very small and light, inexpensive to buy large capacity memory cards (doesn't come with one and has almost no internal memory), recharges fast via outlet or usb, and best of all takes great pictures!  I'm not sure about all of the exposure options since I mainly have just used it on the default settings but it takes great low light indoor pictures and great outdoors pictures in all kinds of light.  VERY fast to take multiple pictures, there is virtually no delay and this is one of the best things about the camera.  You can literally take a picture or two per second!  Zooms in very well and super close with no distortion.  The video recording works, but wont knock your socks of with the quality of the video or audio.  Decent enough in a pinch I suppose if aliens landed or something though!

Reviews.Title: Great...until it broke - low quality design
Reviews.Author: T. E. Roper
Reviews.Content: The camera performs very well, but the build quality is low so it can break very easily and you can forget the warranty.  It is easy to carry in your pocket or a purse and that is exactly what we did.  The push button to take the picture broke off so we couldn't take pictures.  I'm an engineer, so I took a close look at it.  The parts controlling the zoom and the snap are made of plastic and one of the prongs broke off.  I asked my wife to call Panasonic so they could send me a replacement part to fix it.  She never could get through to a real person and after reading about the lousy experiences that others have had with customer service and repairs, I decided that it was a lost cause.  I dissected an old Canon camera that I had to see if I could find a usable part and now I see the difference.  Canon uses metal bolts to secure their zoom and snap.  To semi-salvage the Panasonic, I super glued the plastic zoom piece to hold the snap piece in place so that the camera can take pictures, but the zoom will never work again.  Goodbye Panasonic, I'm going back to Canon for my replacement camera.

Reviews.Title: Great digicam for the price
Reviews.Author: Dr Jay "ljison"
Reviews.Content: For a lightweight, high quality, low price point and shoot it is hard to beat this camera, which now sports a Leica lens.  I had an earlier version of this camera and was heartbroken when someone dropped it and the extending lens stopped functioning.  I am much happier with this camera.  Though I do miss using standard AA batteries, but that made the camera a bit bulkier and heavier.  Not the back up battery fits in the carrying case pouch.  The video sound quality is decent as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Bo Pritchard
Reviews.Content: Have really enjoyed this camera. Got it for a cruise I was going on and thoroughly enjoyed both the very portable size and excellent pic quality

Reviews.Title: Nothing to brag about.
Reviews.Author: howard c. poulin jr.
Reviews.Content: I expected that a Panasonic branded product would live up to my hopes of a dependable and durable camera.  The pictures and options were ok, and it performed well for just over a year.  Then at a local stock-car track, my wife tried to take a shot of a car performing a victory smoke show.  The smoke coming up into the stands from the burnout caused the camera to have difficulty while trying to focus.  It was as though the auto-focus became confused by the object on the track, and the surrounding smoke in front of the lens.  The auto-focus operated back and forth a few times, and finally froze at a max point.  It hasn't been able to focus since that happened.  Solidly stuck. I can now pay to have it repaired, or buy another camera.  I doubt if it will be a Panasonic if we buy new.

Reviews.Title: Great quality, great price
Reviews.Author: Grant Winney
Reviews.Content: Purchased about 4 months ago. Have had no problems with it. I have a camcorder which is pretty small, but still bulky, especially compared to this camera... it's very slim and lightweight. The price was reasonable too. I'd definitely recommend it to a friend if they were looking for a camera.If you're looking for compatible products, I purchased it with the Panasonic Lumix Leather Black Slim Case for FS62/ FS7/ FS15/ FS25 (DMW-PSS13XEK) and the Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card (TS8GSDHC10E), and have been happy with both of those products too.

Reviews.Title: Overall neat
Reviews.Author: Moriah Morgan
Reviews.Content: The camera works great, one feature that I love is if it accidentally turns on in the case it will turn off due to inactivity which is awesome with battery life. The video is disappointing. It doesn't capture night time really well and blurs out a lot. Overall happy but sad that the video isn't that great.

Reviews.Title: Its there when you need it!
Reviews.Author: Dann Cross
Reviews.Content: This shirt pocket camera is loaded with more useful features than those combined among my previous cameras! I don't go anywhere without it!

Reviews.Title: a lot of featuers for the money
Reviews.Author: EDWARD
Reviews.Content: A great camera for the money It takes great pictures, is small enough to fit in your pocket. The options for taking a picture area amazing. Also takes videos although I haven't used that feature yet.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera!
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Marchant
Reviews.Content: I'm by no means a camera or photography fanatic but I certainly want a great quality camera and that's what this is. I did a lot of research and now that I have this camera I can assure you it is top notch quality. It is fast, great focus, tons of features. I particularly like the burst shot, panoramic shot, quick upload time, etc. Can't go wrong with this for a small, point and shoot camera! Excellent quality!

Reviews.Title: Horrible warranty service
Reviews.Author: klaus
Reviews.Content: This has nothing to do with the seller of the camera.The camera worked great for a little over a week after which it broke.  It took Panasonic a whole month before they looked at the camera.  Their solution was to send me a "comparable" camera as a replacement.  The problem was that they where going to send a far inferior camera as a replacement, one that retails for half of the SZ7!  After insisting, they offered a refund of my purchase price, which will take 6 to 7 weeks to process!!!!  So, buy a camera which breaks after a week, then wait 3 month's before it gets resolved!  The worst consumer experience ever.  Don't buy Panasonic!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth more than what I paid for it!
Reviews.Author: Triple "gp04g"
Reviews.Content: We have had this for a few months now and my wife and I love it. It is easy to use. The picture quality is excellent. I have not come across any problems or nitpicks. We had originally gotten this camera for my in-laws, but my wife likes it so much, we might get another one just for her. This camera is that easy to use. All the reviews were spot on. There are still more options I have not yet explored, but the few I tried out, I love.We used this camera on our day trip to Yosemite. My only regret is that I did not yet have a spare battery. We took a lot of pictures and lots of videos, so by the end of the day, the battery was done.

Reviews.Title: I like the camera.
Reviews.Author: muriel pellissier
Reviews.Content: This camera was recommended by my Grandson, and it is easy to use and takes excellent pictures.  I am still learning about it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Point n' Shoot
Reviews.Author: Erik M Helin
Reviews.Content: This replaced an older Panny that only shot 720P video. The controls are intuitive, and the video is a one button on/off. I use it to record in-car autocross videos, and they come out great. The unit is nicely sized for carrying pretty much anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great point-and-shoot at a great price
Reviews.Author: Francis Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I'm no photographer, but when I use this I feel like maybe I have some ray of hope. (Okay, not really, I'm hopeless.)This is great for taking pictures in whatever setting you want - vacation, cute dog pics, creeping on your neighbor (kidding, don't do that.), etc. Pictures always end up looking great. The camera itself is a nice size, making it not too bulky to carry around for everyday use. Additionally, it takes great videos at full 1080p resolution. The only downside is that the charging is done by plugging the camera into a cable. Meh.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Cochise
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and small enough for a pocket.  I use it all the time and it hasn't failed me yet!  I use it a lot to make videos, it gives excellent quality.  I highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: T. Riordan
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for a trip to Bryce Canyon and the GSENM.  What a great little camera.  Fits well in a bag, and the optical zoom is amazing.  Took some great pictures. Blew them up to 8 x 10 size with no distortion.  Takes SLR type and quality picts!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Lorena
Reviews.Content: Love the zoom and stability of the camera in such a compact body. Fits perfectly in my hands, not too small or too big. Great quality of picture for the price. I'm not so crazy about the battery compartment door, I haven't had any problems with it opening accidentally yet but I can see it becoming a problem in the future. Overall great camera for a great price.

Reviews.Title: User friendly
Reviews.Author: Ruth A Fox
Reviews.Content: I received the camera just in time to pack for Ireland.  The compact size made it easy to carry.  The camera took crisp photos, whether they were close up, telephoto, low light or bright light.  I look forward to reading the manual for further tips on using the camera.The camera does need to be charged each night to insure adequate battery.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for cruising
Reviews.Author: Ladydi
Reviews.Content: Small, but powerful, great in low light. It was perfect for traveling and it takes amazing pictures. We bought it because our big camera is bulky. And to our surprise this camera took pictures as good as the big camera.

Reviews.Title: Replaced an unbroken (thought to be broken), Panasonic Lumix FH20
Reviews.Author: MLS
Reviews.Content: OK, so I have the Lumix FH20 and suddenly, it was taking lousy pictures. I fiddled with every setting I could think of to no avail. I'd only had the camera 3 years, but loved it so I decided to get another Panasonic Lumix. That should tell you how much I think of Panasonic cameras (even "broken" ones).When my new camera arrived, I was thrilled for the extra zoom and the video feature of being able to zoom in and out, something I couldn't do with the FH20. But wait.....what is that little red button in the top right corner of the camera on the FH20 that looks like the little red button on the SZ7?. iA.....humbling little devil. That stands for "Intelligent Auto". It's frightening to learn your camera is smarter than you! I had never hit that button but, upon doing so, I had to wonder why Panasonic made it an option to take washed out pics instead of fantastic pics (although the washed out pics did have a certain charm if you squinted long enough).The SZ7 has enough new and different settings to keep me occupied for months. It will take me a while to adjust to the different settings from my ingrained (minus that little red button) use of the old, cherished camera.The picture and video quality seem great to me so far. I never leave the house without my camera tucked in my purse and this one (and the old one) suits that purpose perfectly. The SZ7 is actually slimmer than the FH20. Panasonic managed to pack more features into less body. Pretty awesome!There is a silver lining to this debacle. I love my new camera and will have my husband take my old one with him on trips since his camera is really (really) bad and has the wrong memory card to make things easy to download onto an iPad or any other modern piece of technology.I'm now the proud owner of two great cameras, one with more bells and whistles, the other with lots of great memories. Win, win. I'm not a professional photographer. Just someone who wants to capture moments on the fly. This camera fits me beautifully.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kristin Anderson
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera based on the reviews and the fact that is compact and lightweight.  We are thrilled with it.  Good quality pictures and zoom.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Michael Dunston
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the Panasonic Lumix SX7. It is small, very easy to use and takes great photos.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: C. Trahan
Reviews.Content: It's everything I'd hoped for when purchased.  I particularly like that making movies is done with a separate button and not a mode switch.  Not recommended if you have large hands.

Reviews.Title: A -1 Best Buy for Digital Camera in it's category
Reviews.Author: Nolan Phillips "nolanzoe"
Reviews.Content: Excellent in all respects. Compact, easy to use, good quality photo's and video.Has all the bells and whistle's. Quality. This was a refurbished camera, you would never know.I came freshly packaged with manual and accessories.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Jess C. Wright
Reviews.Content: Having researched the specs. and reviews for the point and shoot camaras, I chose this camara as best meeting my needs.  It more than meets all my expectations.  The X10 optical zoom is a marvel, and that alone sold me on this camara.  I have seen some reviews that claimed not the best resolution. This is a low-medium priced point-and-shoot, so I figured this would not be a problem for me.  My first test was an X10 shot of my dog which I printed on 8.5x11 paper.  The quality is just excellent.  This camara, as all others, has far more fearures than I will ever use.  The on-line manual is 136 pages!  The auto mode seems to work as well or a little better than others I have used and the flash is very good as well.  The auto focus and frameing are excellent also.  All-in-all a great little unit.I do all of my editing on the PC so I have not used all the fancy features. In the editing process I have noted I have only had to adjust the exposure a little (one or two steps) and thats it.  This camara seems to be be a bit better than any others I have used.One other point, I have large hands and fat fingers, and I find the contols easy to use, and the operation simple and clear.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for casual photography
Reviews.Author: Susan Prior
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a recent trip because I wanted something that was better than my phone but didn't want to lug around the two pound high end digital with all the accessories. This camera was perfect! Small enough to slip into my purse, yet picture quality is excellent. Low light pics were exceptional. I'm very happy with it. I got a spare battery so I would always have one charged and ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Gordon Flitton
Reviews.Content: The camera produces great photos and is easy to use.  I like a single button form movies. It is small enough to place in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica Mednick
Reviews.Content: This camera is better even than I thought it would be. Great pictures in black and white, it is also really fast which has made for some great photos of kids and animals. I also love the small size.

Reviews.Title: Recommended by a friend
Reviews.Author: Nana in CA
Reviews.Content: A great camera for taking video and snapshots and a real bargain.  I did not realize the video download was for PC use, but I am learning to use iMovie to edit my videos.

Reviews.Title: great compact camera
Reviews.Author: Wisconsin shopper
Reviews.Content: I had an older Panasonic camera and lost it, and am very happy that I replaced it with another Lumix.  Great pictures;  great features in this small design.  LOVE..

Reviews.Title: Looked New
Reviews.Author: R. M. Smith
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived quickly and was packaged well.  It was used as soon as it arrived. It looked like a new camera and phas performed well. Takes good pic and does well with video also. Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: kevin terry
Reviews.Content: I bought the Lumix SZ7 mainly based on other reviews and was not disappointed.  For a camera in its price range ($85 refurb) the zoom works better than cameras that I have paid twice as much just for the lenses.  The picture quality is very good and the look and feel of the camera is great, the only thing I don't like, and its minor, is it doesn't give you many manual mode choices, but that said I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a quality point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Kardar
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of the pictures that this camera takes! I am super impressed with it...and I would recommend it to anyone. The images are very sharp.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot once you figure it out
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I just wanted an easy to use point and shoot camera. I have a toddler and another baby on the way so I needed a camera that didn't require much fiddling. My criteria was as follows:- must be slim and lightweight to fit in my purse- must have a fast shutter speed to catch pictures of my toddler- must take great picturesAfter a lot of research I decided on this camera and I love it! The camera is very thin and lightweight. I carry it with me where ever I go because it doesn't add much weight to my already heavy purse. The camera has a "burst" mode which allows you to take multiple pictures in a row. This feature is what sold me. I am able to get actual pictures of my toddler. I just take a bunch then go through and delete the blurry ones. Burst mode doesn't work with the flash but that hasn't been an issue.The picture quality is great too. I never print anything bigger than 5x7 so i'm not sure how larger prints would look.One thing worth mentioning is that the camera is very manual. There are actual buttons for some features like older cameras but once I got used to it, It's not an issue.Overall I'd recommend this to mom's and people who are just looking for a point and shoot. My husband likes fancier cameras and he still grabs this one for quick photos. I wouldn't recommend this to people looking for high quality or landscape photos.

Reviews.Title: Takes wonderful pictures
Reviews.Author: in the mn
Reviews.Content: Easy to use,  The size is right for those who do not want a micro camera.  A great camera for the price.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Larry A. Myers "Larry"
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for what I wanted and needed.  Small compact easy to operate.  I love the zoom and the panorama capabilities.  It's great for vacation photos.

Reviews.Title: Very Good 1080p video, some of the best I have seen
Reviews.Author: Dan (aka THXkid)
Reviews.Content: On the pic side takes good but not great pics, its great pics for a point and shoot, but I bought it for the video and for the 1080p and this really shines here, crisp video, great colors can zoom while filming and has great stereo sound and no noise from either the uaido focus or zoom a big plus, main reason to use is to mount on a hat for a helmet cam for taking video as I fly helos and quads and the video turns out great, a few times the auto focus does hut so a split second is out of focus while it huts for the focus nothing annoying and it takes the video in the Blu Ray format for east editing in these newer HD editing software works perfect with Corels videostudio pro x4 or 6

Reviews.Title: Small, convenient and reasonably good quality photos.
Reviews.Author: Robert Breslin "Bob B"
Reviews.Content: This is the third pocket sized camera I have purchased and the first I have decided to keep.  I am used to a full sized digital camera which has produced entirely acceptable quality, but its larger size has been a source of limitations and inconvenience.  I have tried to find a pocket sized camera that will produce comparable quality photos to my full sized camera without success.  The SZ7 comes as close as I think I will get at an affordable price to the image quality I desire in a small camera.  I admit this sounds like a back handed complement, but I am a fussy individual and therefore hard to please.  The convenience of this camera in use and its acceptable image quality are definite pluses.  I therefore recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Matt Vande Berg
Reviews.Content: I have bought two of these within the past few years.  They are great.  Great quality pictures for the price.  I have no qualms about this at all.  I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera at an awesome price
Reviews.Author: procore04
Reviews.Content: Get this for my wife based on the customer reviews. She needed something that is very easy to use, but wanted to be able to take good pictures. This camera delivers those things and more. I will recommend to anyone I know that needs to upgrade their digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Problems With Lens Cover
Reviews.Author: Celeste8
Reviews.Content: I like the lightweight convenience of the camera, and the images are clear enough for the usual travel shots. But just after the Costco return policy expired, the lens cover stopped working (my bad) and I returned the camera to Panasonic's repair/exchange outlet in Texas. They sent me a refurbished camera; now, less than two months later, the lens won't retract. More hassle than it's worth, I'm afraid. I will not buy another one of these, in spite of the Leica lens. More research required so that the replacement is dependable.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Clenton M. LaGrone, Jr
Reviews.Content: excellent small camera, especially for the money. good for travel, intuitive controls. delivered as advertised, only issue is with program for copying pictures to email.

Reviews.Title: Great for its price
Reviews.Author: foxhound
Reviews.Content: Just got this in the mail today. So far, everything is easy to set up, indoor and outdoor pictures have great quality. Very small and slim, great pocket camera. Takes great videos, and you don't lose too much quality when zooming in. Very nice camera for its size and price, would recommend this. The only thing I don't like is the charging port door which was hard to open. You have to have long fingernails to dig under and push it up, then lift it up on the other side, I almost broke it.

Reviews.Title: Fast, furious, funtastic-picture-taking
Reviews.Author: Heft
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the money and a real bargain. Better than Canon, Nikon and Sony cameras I have owned. It all comes down to camera speed, light sensitivity and the lens quality...and this camera has it all.

Reviews.Title: Excellent unit and value... one heads up
Reviews.Author: pixel_pusher
Reviews.Content: Great camera, wish it shot RAW, but you can't have everything. One little thing I wish I had known before I bought it.... the usb socket is a uncommon (but standard) mini-B (8 pin) cable, so if you are like me and misplace your cables regularly, plan on buying a couple of extras for the kit (along with the card reader). But Amazon and Monoprice both stock them, so not too bad.

Reviews.Title: Love my Panasonic Lumix SZ7!
Reviews.Author: GrammyCrackers
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It takes wonderful pictures, zooms WAY in, perfect for sports shots of my Grandson's little league games....great close-up flower shots, scenery.  The only thing I miss is a viewfinder.  The battery lasts a loooong time, I haven't even had t charge it yet!  I've taken lots of pictures, lots of zooming and "unzooming", playback, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures and features for the price
Reviews.Author: cjksr
Reviews.Content: I researched a lot of cameras before I bought this one.  It takes great pictures, HD video, and it has great zoom.

Reviews.Title: A great Panasonic Camera
Reviews.Author: Joyce Southworth
Reviews.Content: East to use. High quality photos.  Small enough to take anywhere with great telephoto capabilities.  It will be with us on our trip to South Africa and Kruger National Park.

Reviews.Title: So much better than my 5 year old Lumix
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: At this price, it is really worth upgrading an older camera.  This camera is much faster than my old one.  I do NOT like the recommended case (Case Logic TBC-302), however.  It does NOT have space for the small USB charger.

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "kindle newbie"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my daughter in law had one and I liked the photos it took.This one is just as good. Takes beautiful picx and is easy to use. You can take pictures quickly without having to wait for the foucas.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7
Reviews.Author: J. Stokes
Reviews.Content: Everything works great! No complaints. Got a nice camera at 2/3 the price. I have read that there are less complaints with refurbished items and they cost less. :)

Reviews.Title: terrific
Reviews.Author: M. Dee Medley "crazy cat lady"
Reviews.Content: I've only taken a few pictures and I'm most anxious to put tit through more of its paces.  Lovely color and definition so far.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: Dr. Bing Shi
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my sister. They used it and love it. No problems. The images look great. I like it

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: mv
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a small compact camera to take with us to Europe and we found it in this camera. This is a great camera, small enough to fit in your pocket and very light, yet a very powerful camera. I am very happy with the speed of taking pictures, other cameras the wait from the time you push the button until the time the picture is taken is to long and you miss the shot, not with this camera, very fast.

Reviews.Title: Love the size and clarity of the image
Reviews.Author: J.H.D. "MO quilter"
Reviews.Content: I have misplaced my instruction book, and that is a problem because the images on the camera, itself, are not self-explanatory.  But, the camera, itself, is great.  Love the size and the fact it has a long-lasting battery system.  My son has two Panasonics, one like this, and he sold me on it.

Reviews.Title: My experience with the Luminix
Reviews.Author: Robert J Berry
Reviews.Content: I have only used this camera once. The pictures came out clear the images were good & not blurry. I would recommend this camerabased on the experience as stated.

Reviews.Title: Great for a compact camera
Reviews.Author: Allen R. Batson
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a great little camera you could put in your shirt pocket, this is the one.  Great photos, cheap price.  Bought a reconditioned one.  Seems new and $35 cheaper.

Reviews.Title: This camera is AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Sean V
Reviews.Content: I was initially a little worried, because it's always scary buying an electronic without being hands on with it first. but once I received it in the mail I pulled it out and immediately had a huge smile on my face. This camera is flawless! (based on looks) I'm not to much into the technicalities of it but what I can tell you is that it takes incredible pictures! the shutter speed was definitely one of my favorite qualities. it's a lot faster than most. the zoom is great, especially when you're recording. it has a lot of different modes to choose from for outdoors, indoors, low light, etc.. it's very light and convenient for those moments you don't want to miss. honestly since I've had it, I find any excuse I can to go outside and just take pictures of anything I come across. I am more than happy with this camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Mike T
Reviews.Content: Great pictures, some picture noise on night shots.  But excellent value vis-a-vis the sister Leica cameras, which tend to be 4-5x the price.  Battery could last a little longer but can still manage 200-300 pictures on one charge,

Reviews.Title: Nice small and easy to use
Reviews.Author: MaDaHada
Reviews.Content: The camera is as expected. Small easy to fit in a pocket or small purse. Picture quality is very good. Easy to use. Battery life is ok, on a scale of never running out being great. Only thing I would reconsider is the rechargeable battery vs taking a couple extra batteries along.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for average user
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: In looking for a new camera I wanted something that was easy to use, created great photos and hopefully used the SD card I already have from my previous camera.  This camera is great!I took ~175 photos on a recent vacation trip and only a few (maybe 4 or 5) turned out fuzzy and unusable.  Keep in mind, I am not a professional, I just whip out the camera, snap a quick shot and move on.I am also very fond of the zoom on this camera.  It blows my previous camera out of the water and allows me to take "close up" shots from a distance.I think this camera has a great balance of zoom and resolution for the average user.  The shutter time is quite snappy and I really enjoy the ability to take panorama shots.  I also took a couple videos on our vacation and they came out great!All in all, I cannot complain one bit about this purchase.  Given the price, I think I received far more for my money than I expected.

Reviews.Title: I like mine so much that I bought this one for my wife.
Reviews.Author: striper2
Reviews.Content: Great zoom, easy to store in pocket, bought battery charger and better batteries through Amazon cheap, great videos, auto focus makes me a genius, quick efficient transfer to Iphoto album on my IMac.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good modern compact
Reviews.Author: Spizzle
Reviews.Content: This is a nice modern camera. Mediocre materials but well constructed and seems study enough. High resolution display. Nice wide lens. Zoom is okay and pretty good for a compact. High resolution photos and video. Zoom is really smooth during videos. Screen shows how much recording time you got left. 30 minutes may be the max. It's lighter weight than I expected, I guess they're getting better at that. I like the loading area for the memory card and battery it's cool. The control buttons are all too small, too freaking hard to push them. Probably my biggest complaint. And since they're so small it seems easy to break them. You gotta charge the battery in the camera, wish it came with external charger, $20 more for that. Will update later after more testing.

Reviews.Title: Small and handy
Reviews.Author: ac
Reviews.Content: SZ7 is one of the best PNS camera at its price range.This camera is compact and functional. Build quality is good and performance under low light is acceptable, better than most of those CCD cameras that are under $150.Due mainly to its pocket size weight and reasonably good performance, I bring along SZ7 with me most of the time if I only intend to take some causal photo although I own a few other cameras including DSLRs and a LX7 (also from Amazon).However, the start up of this camera is slow and detail is lacking especially in marco. If you don't mind waiting for an extra second and do not always enlarge photo beyond 8R, SZ7 can be a ideal PNS.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Musky78
Reviews.Content: My wife & I were looking for a small pocket size camera for when we do not want to lug around our Cannon T2i. Our major wanted  feature was being able to take picture quickly. Our past point and shoot cameras simply could/can not do this without substantial lag. This Panasonic can really snap them quickly! The pictures are great!

Reviews.Title: So far so good....
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: We purchased the SZ7 14.1 MP with 10x zoom for a trip we took recently.  So far it seems to be working well.  I am happy with the images.  I think for the price, it is a good buy :)

Reviews.Title: couldn't be better
Reviews.Author: soonmin hong
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery.  Camera work great as It should comes with lovely small case.  HD movie with MP4 format for easy job with PC. It would be better if charging cable were standard micro USB.  Other that that, Just great.  Price can't be beaten. .  Overall, great product reliable retailer!! Thanks.

Reviews.Title: tiny, easy to use, fits in a pocket
Reviews.Author: Friskers
Reviews.Content: I needed a point and shoot camera to keep in my pocket at work.  Amazon had this on sale and I own Panasonic's Micro 4/3's cameras personally, so I figured it would take good to excellent pictures.  It hunts a little in low light, but takes excellent pictures.  It is fairly quick to turn on and off, and easily fits in a pocket.

Reviews.Title: Fast and user friendly
Reviews.Author: C. Lodevico "CBL"
Reviews.Content: The Panasonic Lumix SZ7 is easy to use, has just the right amount of features and very fast.  Once you click over the on button, the camera is ready to go; no waiting for the load screen to go away.  The features are great; so far I've tried the panorama mode miniature mode, and action mode and these features have worked very well.  The battery life is not the best, but as long as the camera is fully charged you can take photos the entire day and it doesn't take that long to charge the battery.  Also, loading photos onto the computer from the camera is very simple, no software is needed just the USB cable.  If you want a camera that is ready to take photos right when you turn it on, this is the camera to get; really fast start up and clear photos.  Tip: invest in a high speed memory card to upload and take photos faster.

Reviews.Title: My New Camera!
Reviews.Author: Todd Urbanowicz
Reviews.Content: This is my third Panasonic Lumix digital camera in the past twelve years.  For the price and the size, this one is even better than the great ones I had before.  Perfect pocket camera!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: D. Union
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly, works great. Easy to use. My daughter uses it and it takes great pictures, low light, as good or better than expected. Always happy with Panasonic cameras so far.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: So many features!! Easy to figure out if you just play with it for a while. So many possibilities!! It works like a professional camera without being so big and bulky!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrea s
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the price.  We looked at many cameras before we purchased the SZ7.  It is a great camera at it's price point.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: dreston "dreston"
Reviews.Content: This camera is compact, takes great, clear pics, and has a fast shutter speed. I bought a more expensive Nikon camera and returned it because the pics were blurry. Should have made this my 1st pick!

Reviews.Title: bought it for my wife birthday
Reviews.Author: Arthur S. Cohen "livinintheoc"
Reviews.Content: she loves this little camera and it takes great pics and video too. real easy to use a well. i would buy again and price was great too!

Reviews.Title: LOVE this camera
Reviews.Author: Princess J
Reviews.Content: This is my third Panasonic Lumix in 8 years (I have to stop dropping them!). It's difficult, if not impossible to find it at retail stores, and for the money, it's by far the best camera for point and shoot photography on the go. While I love the camera  in my smartphone, not having an interchangeable SD card challenges me when I know I'll be taking lots of pictures. This is the perfect solution. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: jerry
Reviews.Content: This is a great point and shoot camera with a Leica lens. Photos are sharp and crisp and works very well in low light without flash.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Joel  Rogers
Reviews.Content: The camera was everything that everyone said it would be.  I'm no photographer by no means, so my inputs are definitely laymen.  The separate switch for the viewing mode is convenient.  It also uses the large flash card (which we had numerous from previous cameras) which is nice.  Most other cameras this small use the small ones.  The zoom works nice and the camera takes incredibly good pictures.  I'm very pleased with it!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7
Reviews.Author: Alvaro E. Restrepo
Reviews.Content: Sized camera, comfortable to carry as it takes up no space, very good zoon, 3 "screen, easy to manage your software is user friendly, I recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Doris Engish "Doris Staton English"
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for a gift for my sister.  It arrived timely and in excellent condition.  As we reviewed the manual were quite pleased with all that could be accomplished with this small camera along with ease of use.The size is perfect, small enough to slip into a pocket and yet powerful enough to take vibrant photographs and even videos with sound.  I ordered it because I had an older Panasonic Lumix which has proved most satisfactory with ease of use and quality of photos so. My sister enjoyed borrowing mine so I am sure she will greatly enjoy this upgraded one.[...]

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: B. Staton "Gran D"
Reviews.Content: The shutter speed isn't as fast as the You Tube review, but it's a nice little camera to carry with in a pocket. Exactly what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Pate
Reviews.Content: I use it for any on the go point-and-shoot events. Pictures taken with this camera have all been of great quality.

Reviews.Title: A winner!
Reviews.Author: Nora R. Smith
Reviews.Content: It will take me a month of Sundays to slog through all the instructions, since I'm a bit camera-illiterate, but my thirteen-year-old is already having fun with this, and assures me it's a phenomenal camera.  The few pictures (on the automatic setting) which I've taken certainly are amazing.  My only worry is that when my husband discovers it, I will have seen the last of my new camera--I hear the videos are out of this world, too!  Altogether, unless I break it, probably the last camera I'll ever need!  (And I won't even have to buy batteries all the time--it comes with a rechargeable!)P.S.:  I just have to add to this.  I've now had the camera for a couple of months, and it is wonderful.  The picture clarity is amazing, and even a total ignoramus like me is beginning to figure out the fancy functions.  Like the panorama picture feature.  I managed to take some absolutely amazing shots just the other day, and am as happy as a clam, and oh-so-proud of myself.  This is a great camera for someone who will never be a professional photographer, but wistfully wants pictures that are as close to that as a near-hopeless amateur can get.  This camera will make it happen, believe me!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: D. Curley
Reviews.Content: Great ability to customize settings, but the auto settings are terrific too! The image quality is higher than other small point-and-shoots, which is what sold me in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for a parent in her late 70's
Reviews.Author: S. W. Conley
Reviews.Content: We needed a EASY to use camera.This is the 4th Panasonic I have bought for relatives. One each for kids and wife.  (I have Canon DSLR's).The thing I like about Panasonic is that they seem to have the best "smart mode" around.Until I started playing with them, I have NEVER used the auto mode on any camera. As a DSLR user I was never satisfied.Curiously, Panasonic's "intelligent mode" really is. I virtually ALWAYS use that on these cameras even thought I prefer complete manual on my DSLRs.  (The other two my daughters have are the TS1 and TS3 waterproof ones).Feature wise it has about everything and is small too.As with ALL small sensor point-n-shoots, low light JPEG noise bugs me - but won't show up in 4x6's - only if you get 10x14's etc.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Deborah K. Castle
Reviews.Content: Lost the sister camera in Aruba - bought this 14 months and has even better functions but $20 less!  Have been very pleased with Panasonic quality.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures and features for the price
Reviews.Author: EZ
Reviews.Content: This camera is ultra swell for the price, it takes clear, high resolution pictures and has a boat load of features.

Reviews.Title: After Much Review
Reviews.Author: Done my Research
Reviews.Content: I've search and read over many point and shoot cameras, and CNET rated this best buy for the price.  I wanted a very slim P&S; camera I could throw in my pocket and still have a decent zoom.  WIN WIN with this buy.

Reviews.Title: Great pocket camera!
Reviews.Author: N0ORM
Reviews.Content: I did some research to determine the most robust pocket camera.  Lumix won! Has everything I wanted including full HD 1080 Peasy to use and nothing to figure out!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Buntline
Reviews.Content: An excellent little camera that does all.  Got one for my nephew, and my daughter liked it, so bought one for her, too.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This camera has few small flaws.  You have to look straight at the lcd screen to see it clearly.  But what the camera can do better than anything else Ive used anywhere near this price is take photos very fast and take them well in low light.  Perfect for taking pictures of your kids.

Reviews.Title: very nice slim camera.
Reviews.Author: junkie
Reviews.Content: Works great so far. Light and easy to use. Had some battery life so I started taking pics right away. Great camera

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Sheryl
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it.  It's a good size, and although it's small it is still easy to use the buttons, even though he has big hands.  The LCD is nice a big.

Reviews.Title: Lumix S27 14.1 MP
Reviews.Author: P. Goonetilleke
Reviews.Content: My wife is having a great time with this camera. She gave me her old Lumix and says that this is quite an improvement on what she had. She is taking some great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Mirinda
Reviews.Content: I got this camera just for a small, capable replacement for my older digital point and shoot.  This camera is a great value and had more features than I expected (or will probably use!).  I haven't shot enough with it to check out the picture quality or battery life, but so far it looks quite good.I would get it again for its value, function, and ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Very cool camera
Reviews.Author: Laura K
Reviews.Content: I really love this compact camera with the HD video feature as well as lithium recharge batteries.  I can't stand those AA battery ones!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful clear pictures wit ease
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: Love love love this camera!  The ease of it is amazing, and for a point and shoot the pictures are crisp and clear.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Binoy
Reviews.Content: No real complaints except for red eye issues. Not sure if I'm doing something wrong or if there is something inherently wrong with taking pics in darker rooms. Everything looks good otherwise.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: bopper
Reviews.Content: I've owned this camera for about 6 months...I love it.....it takes good quality pictures is compact and can be held in a shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my dad!
Reviews.Author: Daniella Escalona "Daniella"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my dad before our family trip to New York City. He loves taking pictures with it, and out of all the cameras that we took on the trip (Samsung WB150F) it took the best pictures!

Reviews.Title: Nice small point and shoot
Reviews.Author: K. Morrissey
Reviews.Content: Very nice point and shoot. it takes great shots right out of the box and has a lot of settings for the above average user .I love how its small enough for a shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: A great inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: L. W.
Reviews.Content: Small, fits anywhere, takes great photos, not much more to say.  It's great, I'd buy it again, you should too!

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7
Reviews.Author: cmillar
Reviews.Content: Did my homework and decided on this camera. It's great! Excellent all around portable camera which excels in every category for it's price.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my Nikon Coolpix S3100. This camera takes great pictures, and is very easy to use. The shutter speed is very fast and the zoom works fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Really nice aspect, good design and easy to use ;)
Reviews.Author: Vinti Stefan
Reviews.Content: I really recommend this product. It's a very good deal, and I am happy that I chose this camera. Good pictures, and Full HD awesome clips ;)

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: April Mason
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! takes great night shots, even in low lighting, and very fast consecutive shots as well! we were just on vacation and it worked wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7 Camera
Reviews.Author: tman
Reviews.Content: Like the camera, esp. the 10X zoom.  Small and easy to use for the novice photographer.  Great burst shooting for for action pix.  Quick shipping.  I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Wife's Christmas present
Reviews.Author: JSebass
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife. Gave it to her early so she could take Christmas pics. So far she loves it! i will let you know if anything changes....

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: I enjoy using this point and shoot--it has great lens quality and is very easy to use.  It has lots of features and is fairly intuitive.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the money
Reviews.Author: tim paul milton
Reviews.Content: Purchased in as an addition to a canon rebel which is a big camera - this Panasonic is very light, flexible and shoots well above its class. Photos of a wide range of conditions produced bright, crisp results.Do recommend this camera for point and shoot type applications, where you need that extra quality dimension you look for in more expensive alternatives.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for it price
Reviews.Author: jsnjack
Reviews.Content: I like this camera because it very compact and nice looking. 10x zoom works really nice (I used to have Sony S950 before and zoom worked really terrible). Picture quality is good too (actually, I need to take more pictures at different conditions). I have to notice a price of this item. It awesome! Finally, great tourist's camera.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive 10x zoom camera with a few cons
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: TL;DRPros:10x zoomLow PriceQuick focusQuick startup25mm wide-angleCons:Picture distortion at 25mmExtremely low battery lifeNo manual control settings - just scene modes (I knew that already when I bought it but thought to mention it for those that may me interested)Full Review:I bought the camera from another store that had it on sale and not from Amazon. I had an upcoming trip and thought it would be a good time to test it out. To provide some idea about my photography background, my other camera is a Canon XSi that I normally shoot in full manual so I'm one of those guys that knows what he is doing when taking a photo. I'm by no means a pixel peeper so those with questions about how the picture looks when enlarged all the way can skip this review.I bought the camera primarily due to its price, zoom range, quick focus and wide-angle. It was primarily intended for my wife who was using a Casio EX-S12 (12 MP, 3x zoom with 36 - 108mm equivalent to full frame). I've not been disappointed in those features except, perhaps, the distortion that I found in one wide-angle photo at 25mm (the person's head was elongated slightly when in the upper right thirds of the picture). Pictures came out good, for the most part. I had read that the battery life was low so I went in expecting that. I just didn't know how it would impact me. So I was bitterly disappointed when I found that it would not even last through a typical vacation day. The battery gave out on me halfway through the day (lasted for approx 170 pictures and 2 5-10 second videos). Having other cameras saved the day for me.I'm now contemplating whether to keep the camera or return it but will probably keep it since the pros outweigh the cons. I'll buy an extra battery and an external charger to compensate for the short battery life so that will need to be factored into the cost of the camera as well.I will update this review if any of my impressions about this camera change with further use of the camera.

Reviews.Title: I would not buy this.
Reviews.Author: Armsmere
Reviews.Content: I did not have good luck with this camera. The screen broke while I had it in my breast pocket.  Can even tell how that happened.  Also the battery cover latch did not work well.  Junked after a few  months.  Took great pictures while it lasted though.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Mary Beyer
Reviews.Content: I do not recommend buying from this company. I purchased this camera in November and it broke it April. I contacted the company to ask for an exchange and I was told NO. because it was purchased 6 months ago usually there is a years warranty at any other place so I do not recommend buying from this pereson.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: L1
Reviews.Content: Only received this camera a few days ago.  Seems to be a nice little camera.  All the bells and whistles grandma needs to take pics of those quick little grandkids...very short lag time, good focus, and zoom. very light weight, fits in my pocket.  Panasonic and Leica lens!  The buttons are a little small and I have small hands but I think this is going to work just fine.

Reviews.Title: Eh, it's an okay camera, but not for the price it's not
Reviews.Author: chrissmoke
Reviews.Content: For the a comparable price I suggest you buy a canon power shot. I had a power shot before I bought this one. The canon took clear pictures no matter what I did with it it seemed. Unless I shook it purposely the canon always took clear shots. I find with the panasonic I have to fight to keep a steady hand. It sucks. I take many pictures for selling on ebay and craigslist. With this camera I have to take several pics of each shot just to make sure I get one that is not blurry. I never had that problem with a much older canon powershot.

Reviews.Title: Great Compact Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Raoul Duke
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a compact camera that is easy to use and produces good results, this is it.  Make sure to add the charger/extra battery kit and a 16gb card and you are good to go.

Reviews.Title: super little camera for very reasonable cost.
Reviews.Author: Bass Hound
Reviews.Content: Great point and shoot intelligent mode, simply click shutter, even my wife can do it. :)A few nice controllable modes to play with. Awesome for the money!

Reviews.Title: Good show, Panasonic
Reviews.Author: Eggman23 "Ed"
Reviews.Content: It's got the MOS , the Leica lens, the Panasonic electronic know how. Whew, what a cool camera. It can do 3-D for your TV; though not mine, I don't even have cable... Take lotsa pics. eD

Reviews.Title: Good pictures POOR battery
Reviews.Author: Andrey Terletskyy
Reviews.Content: Pictures you get are somehow good. There are nice options like: shooting through the glass, 3D images, panoramic is fast, precise and easy.The battery is VERY week point here - it dies out very-very quickly!

Reviews.Title: Nice quality
Reviews.Author: Ben "Ben"
Reviews.Content: I got this on sale on black Friday from walmart for $100.  I use it often when partying with friends and have taken hundreds of pictures & a few hours of video.  I'm only giving it 4 stars because the video quality could be a little better.  Also I wish the flash could be used for video, I record at night often.  I'd prefer to have at least a 16mp camera too, but for the price this camera was a big nice upgrade from the 7.1mp 640x480 cam I had before.  Though the pictures don't seem to be as sharp as with my old Canon SD1000.

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix sz7
Reviews.Author: daryl
Reviews.Content: bought this camera because i have other Panasonic cameras and i like their operation.this camera is great if it had a viewfinder it would be greater, but you don't find viewfinders anymore.the zoom, the operation and buttons the screen and picture quality are great.as you can see i like this camera, i don't have to carry my fz35 anymore for a good picture.for the price you will not find a better camera

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: N Millet
Reviews.Content: So far this camera is great!  Small, light, and bright viewfinder.  I do not like having to charge the battery while it is in the camera.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7
Reviews.Author: xpane
Reviews.Content: I've owned 2 Olympus digital cameras and a Sony Cybershot. I read many reviews on the Lumix and was very satisfied in making the decision to purchase the Lumix SZ7. This is by far has the most features and is so small and compact. There are many settings that the tourist might want when traveling with this, especially the panorama feature. Comparing it to my Nikon D 70 DSLR's this is the easiest camera to set up a panoramic shoot. It took me literally hours to stitch together the many shots I took on a tripod while steadily rotating around the landscape with my Nikon. The pictures come out very fine and no grain so far. I like the zoom feature in any mode. Most cameras don't let you zoom while filming videos. It has so many features I am learning how to use all the time. Good investment, at a reasonable price with all the features. I would encourage you to buy one of these. I have been photographing since I was a kid and this is the best camera I've owned since I first got my Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera all around, no charger
Reviews.Author: Pablo R. Vitaver
Reviews.Content: I do miss though the panorama feature where you can take a 180 degree long photo, as a previous model had (lost one star).  It takes great photos but it does not come with an external charger (lost 2 more stars for me).  The brand charger is very expensive. The generic one they sell at Amazon is very bulky, so you can't carry the camera + charger in a small pouch.

Reviews.Title: Great camera except for the pictures
Reviews.Author: T. Fricke
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera except for the fact that the pictures it produces just aren't very good.  My parents purchased one for their European vacation.  Almost none of the resulting photos stands up to scrutiny: details are blurry, colors in people's faces washed out.  What good is a Leica-branded lens and 14 megapixels when the color and sharpness just aren't there?  Life is too short for cheap cameras.  I am vastly more happy with the results from a Canon S90 (high-end point-and-shoot), and even modern smartphones produce better images.

Reviews.Title: No protection against dust
Reviews.Author: Russell Helmes
Reviews.Content: The camera has some great features and is very user friendly but I've only had the camera for a couple of weeks and there are many particles of dust stuck on the internal elements of the lens. The lens is unable to be cleaned so any picture larger than 4x6 may have some obvious dust spots.

Reviews.Title: good panasonic camera
Reviews.Author: Lobrito
Reviews.Content: status: waiting for the camera...i am a semipro user, the last two cameras i had were superzoom and dslr, i am moving to ireland for a year, so i dont want to carry with a big and expensive camera, becouse i will be living in student residences.i was reading a lot of reviews and comparing cameras, and this one, is very slim, have 10 x optical zoom, nice features, video full hd, good build quality, i can take it everywhere in my pocket, and i have read a lot of revies from panasonic users and from this camera in particular, and everyone says this is a good choice.i will update this products after some weeks of use. Panasonic i am giving you the chance... i was an canon user.i will be traveling a lot! i need good pics!!

Reviews.Title: LLLLLOVVVVEEEE it!
Reviews.Author: Dolly Dimple "Book worm"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and it is easy to use, small, takes great shots and is easy on batteries!!! It is awesome!

Reviews.Title: i"m pleased
Reviews.Author: robert thompson
Reviews.Content: I'm pleased.The service was fast and hassle free.  The camera was just like in the ad.  Now we have to learn how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Best small camera!
Reviews.Author: jc
Reviews.Content: we have had 4 different compact point and shoot cameras over the last eight years. we chose this one primarily for its very fast shutter time/fast time to take the next picture, and in this regard it is very good. the camera has plenty of features, all well done. we very highly recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great quality images, excellent software, perfect value
Reviews.Author: Formula 455 "Sam"
Reviews.Content: PROS:-Loaded with tons of features in the software-Excellent image quality for a small point-n-shoot-Unbeatable value for moneyCONS:-Feels flimsy and delicate in my hands. Consider getting a silicone skin/shell to beef up protection.

Reviews.Title: This Camera take great pics an re-focuses so fast!!!
Reviews.Author: Katasha R. Smart
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera for the money I spent.  The zoom is amazing and the pics are incredibly clear.

Reviews.Title: The joy of point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after ready many reviews of many cameras, and checking the specs.  First of all, I wanted to cut down on shutter lag time, compared to my previous cameras.  And this has been a tremendous success on that count.  Second, I was impressed by the comments in the reviews about the easy and helpful controls.  That has been another success for this purchase.  Now, I feel like a wise and savvy shopper.

Reviews.Title: OK camera, poor packaging.
Reviews.Author: G. Herman
Reviews.Content: So far the camera and additional batteries seem to work fine, although I haven't had an opportunity to put the camera to extensive use.  My complaint is with the packaging of the camera and batteries.  Both items were in their original packaging and placed in an Amazon box.  Both items were rattling in the Amazon box with no packing to secure them.  There was one plastic piece of bubble wrapping inside the box with a large hole in it and provided absolutely no protection.  I was disappointed in this shoddy packaging.  With the abuse in shipping that frequently occurs it's a miracle nothing was broken.Gary J. HermanCincinnati, Oh

Reviews.Title: Love love love it!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Williams
Reviews.Content: I tend to like my cameras like most men like their women...small, cheap, and easy.  TOTALLY KIDDING!!!  LOL  Seroiusly...this camera is a GREAT deal for the money.  It's nice and compact, easy to use, and takes great pictures.  I love the burst feature which allows you to take several pictures with a single click of the button.  This is great for situation where you have a moving target or that person who always blinks when you take a pic.  The adjustable flash/exposure feature is also great for tricky lighting situations.  Instead of reading the User Manual, I just played around with the camera for about 10-15 mins and had pretty much figured out all of the features/modes.  I can only imagine how great my experience would be if I actually took the time to read the manual. :-)I have gone through at least 4 cameras in the past year trying to find one that met all of my needs.  This is the first time that I actually feel like my search is over.  I've had the camera for about 4 weeks and have taken over 1000 pics so far...vacation and the holidays.  The battery quality is very god, the picture quality is great, and it easily fits in my pocket or small evening bag, so it's always accessible.  This is definitely a great little point and shoot camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera
Reviews.Author: Bog
Reviews.Content: I had a camera just like this one but dropped it and the objective went out of focus.  Replacement:  no question that I didn't want another brand.  Particularly good lens (Leica).  Easy to use - software perhaps more complicated than needed.  I previously had  Canon, two different models but the Panasonic has better objective.  I however was more used to the Canon software and liked it better, perhaps because  I was more used to it.

Reviews.Title: Great Panasonic Camera
Reviews.Author: Someone54
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic camera. It pushes the the abilities of a panasonic camera while being easy to use. It makes it a terrific camera to have. Plus if you have something like the New 32gb Micro Sd Card Sdhc Tf Flash Memory Card 32gb Class 10, New! Usa!, you should enough space to use the camera to the best of its abilities.

Reviews.Title: Lumix Camera
Reviews.Author: richpw
Reviews.Content: Works well and seems to be high quality.  It has a large LCD screen that displays well even in bright sunlight.  We purchased an extra small case which wasn't needed since it comes with a compact small hard case.  Lack of a memory card is disappointing.  We have had many Canons and this is a nice change.  The camera was dropped in the first week and after a few initial problems, it seems to be working very well.  No external battery charger but the battery last a very long time.  We bought two extra batteries (third party) and an external charger which I am now convinced is not necessary.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck I could find
Reviews.Author: Bruce Higgins
Reviews.Content: I bought a Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS20 a few months ago before going on a long trip. I am very happy I did. The basic automatic settings work great. I hate to read directions, so I just experiment and learn as I go. The camera has a plethora of advanced features, including manual settings for shutter or aperture priority. It can rapidly fire off multiple pictures if you want to catch some fast action. It has an amazing Leica 20x zoom lens. It takes high quality stills and videos. It even has GPS. The list of possibilities for experimentation and creative photography goes on and on. If you're going on a trip or doing anything else away from home, you can put the camera in your pocket (or purse) and be ready for any opportunity.The camera is bigger than my light and slim Nikon Coolpix S52, but it still fits comfortably in my pants pocket. I just have to be careful to check the knob on the top of the camera to make sure it's in the right position after I take the camera out of my pocket. When I've forgotten to do that, the camera sometimes fires off multiple pictures or is in the wrong setting, thereby causing me to miss my shot. I also have to be careful not to touch the viewfinder screen so that I don't accidentally take photos I don't intend to take.I read a lot of reviews on Amazon and elsewhere of various point-and-shoot cameras wherein people compared various cameras in great detail. Those reviews helped me make my decision to buy the Panasonic Lumix ZS20. But I won't go into detail here. I'll just say that my old Nikon Coolpix S52 is a nice, simple little camera, but it lacks many of the features of the Panasonic. Plus it's impossible to see anything through the viewfinder outdoors in the sun, so you have to blindly point and shoot. However, the major gripe I have had with the Nikon is that it is painfully slow. It takes forever to react when I press the shutter, so I have missed many "spur of-the-moment" shots. As a former SLR user, I am used to, and still want, a camera that has very little shutter delay. Therefore, I chose the Panasonic. If shutter speed is very important to you, I highly recommend this camera. It's very quick. And the viewfinder is very bright and clear -- although it's still difficult to see exactly what you're taking a picture of in bright sun. I guess that's just something users of all these little cameras have to endure.I love this camera. I only have one noteworthy issue with the Panasonic Lumix ZS20. It eats batteries alive. Watch out if you take long videos, turn the camera off when you're not going to use it for a while, and be sure to turn off the GPS if you don't want to use it. Buy at least two extra batteries and keep all the batteries charged. If you plan to be away from home for a while, be sure to take battery chargers for your hotel room and your car. If you take your computer with you, also take the cord that comes with the camera that you can use to charge a battery while it's in your camera. (Despite some reviewers' negative comments, I have found this internal charging method to be handy at home and on the road.) If you remember to do these things, you won't run out of charged batteries at a critical moment -- as I have done when I didn't follow my own advice.Buy this camera at a good price and I think you'll be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Fred Young
Reviews.Content: Having seen this camera advertised hundreds of times, I  bought it at a good price;  No real substance.  Plastic and inexpensive dials and buttons etc.  Having lost a NIKON on a Carribean island and purchased this on the rebound, I was extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Lumix SZ7 Panasonic camera.
Reviews.Author: Burton Boyd
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived in the time frame stated.  The contents were as described; however, the box was slightly deformed as it was in a cushioned pastic bag rather than double boxed.The camera has a Leica zoom lens that has fantastic resolution.  Although it is advertized as 10X optical, by selection a lower MP from the menu, the 10X on my camera exceeds the 4.5-45 range.  My guess would be the equivalent of a 25mm to 400mm range.  I have mine set to 3MP which has worked out well.It fits into a shirt pocket and is a far cry from the past which would have required a set of heavy lenses to carry around.I am well pleased with Amazon's service.

Reviews.Title: yonny pineda
Reviews.Author: yonny pineda
Reviews.Content: excelente producto mi primera compra y estoy muy satisfecho no dudaría en volver a comprar fue un placer desde limoncito yaritagua yaracuy venezuela

Reviews.Title: Great digital camera
Reviews.Author: Michael F. Pertmer "MP"
Reviews.Content: Great inexpensive digital camera.  Would be nice to include a manual with the camera instead of having to reference one on the Internet.

Reviews.Title: Some nice features
Reviews.Author: Leah Turner
Reviews.Content: One of the reasons we bought this camera was because we read a great review.  Now I think that person must have been paid to write the review.  The only way for reviews to work is for real people who really purchase the product to write the review!!  My biggest complaint about the camera is that you can't take back to back pictures quickly (although the review we read said you could:)

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: BURLET
Reviews.Content: I'm disappointed by the indoor pictures. It's not better than my old entry game lumix, too bad.Outdoor pictures are good.

Reviews.Title: Not great
Reviews.Author: G. Balan "gb"
Reviews.Content: I received the camera yesterday.I charged the battery and started taking photos.Purple colours were seen as blue on LCD screen as well as on laptop.Black looks like dark blue. God knows what other colours I am going to get.I am thinking of returning the camera.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: Jims
Reviews.Content: Picked up this camera at Target to replace my Kodak that is starting to malfunction.I like the design, the features, and everything.  However, the quality of the photos and video is poor in my opinion.I have an old Kodak Easy Share which isn't anything great, but a good camera.  And that 480p video and 10 mega pixel photos are almost better than this new Panasonic.I've uploaded full 1080p videos on YouTube and they look nothing like video uploaded from the higher end Panasonic Models, like the DMC-SZ7.Since I want GOOD 1080p video, not 1080p video that looks like 360p, I will be returning it for a better model.I did a lot of testing, and still not very good.I got this Sony Cybershot wx150, man, it's like night and day compared to this....

Reviews.Title: good one
Reviews.Author: ashik
Reviews.Content: just arrived today. i have gone through the reviews before buying, 'm just holding it and exploring.  at this moment i am very much happy having sz7 in my hand. got to take proper photos (few technical ones) to write something substantial, till then happy shooting :)

Reviews.Title: I wish I spent more money and got a better-one
Reviews.Author: Chichi
Reviews.Content: I'm used to my Panasonic - Lumix DMC-FZ15 (full size) however I'm planning a trip to Europe and thought the smaller digital camera would be easier to carry.  Now I will bring both.

Reviews.Title: No sirve me estafaron esta mala
Reviews.Author: Reinaldo Colina "Colina"
Reviews.Content: No recomiendo comprar esta camara refrabicada perdi mi dinero con este vendedor es un estafador la camara no sirve no enfoca y el lente suena porque esta trabado eres un estafador

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Bryon
Reviews.Content: i bought a used one because i was tight on money but for a reasonable price. Not only that that the box it came in was almost destroyed but the lens its self had a dark sploch on it that could not be remove to be fixed I would have to spend twice as much that i bought this for. Holiday season was kinda ruined for me. But customer service took care of it.....Very Late..
